page.title: 10HOME LIFE (A child's day 2)
page.content: In class we have Maths, then at break we play handstands.After break we have English.12.00 we have break for 40 minutes then in for lunch to eat my sandwiches.1.00 pm we have either Art,Craft,Science,History or Geography until another break and then after break we finish off work and have P.E. or games or in the summer swimming. On Wednesday I sail at Bewl Valley Resevoir.When I get there my brother and I rig our boats,which are Optimists.Then we change.On the water at the beginning we sometimes practise starts or practise rounding buoys.Then the Wednesday night race.One week I came second out of my standard and fourth over all.When we come in again we do the same backwards but sometimes we stay for supper.Then I go home,feed my rabbit and go to bed. (by Jessica Bertram aged 10)
